Review Text:
I still can’t believe how cheap lunch was 
The extensive meats and unlimited drink was amazing 
The quality exceptional and finally when you couldn’t expect more the ice cream
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Ottimo ristorante per rapporto qualità prezzo
Review Text:
Ottimo ristorante a buffet di carne di maiale e pollo dove con meno di 10€ puoi mangiare e bere illimitatamente. 
Ci si cucina sulla piastra in autonomia la carne. 
Peccato che le fettine di bacon siano sempre finite.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Không khí: 5
Review Text:
Chi nhánh Saigoncenter là quán ruột của mình, với mức giá 179k (chưa gồm thuế) nếu đi vào buổi trưa các ngày trong tuần mình thấy là rẻ, vừa túi tiền sinh viên. 
Quầy buffet được lấy thoải mái: thịt, rau, món chiên, mì, cơm, nước ngọt, kem.Thịt tầm 5-6 loại có ướp đầy đủ, ba chỉ bò fill hơi lâu phải canh mới được :))). Vỉ nướng cũng được thay liên tục.
Lần nào tới cũng ăn no căng, lần nào về SG cũng phải ghé lại, không ghé không chịu được.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Text: been here since this was their second store. its been a while since not coming back. the service become so bad. if you order a low cost set, it will be not an acceptable experience. the meat was shown different in photo. the staff still nice. the quality is not really there.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 4
Đồ ăn: 5
Không khí: 4
Review Text:
This is a great spot for couples and groups, but not if you are looking for a quiet romantic time. Second time for us and enjoyed it just as much. There was much consternation among staff and patrons when the power went out for about 5 or 10 minutes but everyone was patient waiting for the electrician and staff were considerate so no issue. 
The food is fantastic, service is great with staff willing to explain and help and the Korean rice wine is fantastic(trying to find it here in Australia). And the kimchi- to die for.
We will be back on our next visit to HCMC.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 3
Đồ ăn: 3
Không khí: 3
Review Text:
We walked around the shopping mall and decided to try something different.
This was our 1st Korean BBQ, so it was rather confusing to start off, there is a danger that you get too much food to cook and its wasted.

Overall it was an experience, the food was fine , possibly overcooked as we were not sure. The chicken was nice.
Would I go there again? Possibly not, nothing wrong, but it’s a novelty that I don’t think its me.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Good Korean BBQ in The Heart of Ho Chi Minh
Review Text:
No complaints, the food was outstanding, the veggies meat and everything about it was quality, The service was very attentive, and not intrusive, I choose the middle price selection, of the set menus, and could not finish all the options that came.
The only drawback was as a solo traveler, I firstly had to convince the receptionist that I would pay for 2 people, who after radioing upstairs was glad to admit me, this maybe why I struggled to finish the food, as they may have sent out for 2 people.
Strangely at the end when the bill was presented I was asked if they were to charge for 1 or 2 people, having indicated that I agreed to pay for 2 the bill including 3 beers came to less than £22.60, and really it would have feed 3 or 4.
Have tried Korean BBQ, before and have been let down, this will give some of the higher cost ones a true run of the money
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 4
Đồ ăn: 5
Không khí: 4
Review Text: We love Korean barbecue and this restaurant did not disappoint. The service from the time we walked in was really good, the food was fresh and enough for 3 to eat comfortably and I had my first Korean rice wine(more please). Thank you to all the staff, we will return when back in HCMC.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Leuk concept voor een Koreaanse bbq
Review Text: Het concept bestaat uit keuze menu’s qua vleessamenstelling en hoeveelheid. Je kunt extra vlees en bijgerechten bestellen. Goede afzuiging en airco. Kwaliteit van het vlees was prima! Kimchi iets mindere kwaliteit maar ok.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 4
Dịch vụ: 3
Đồ ăn: 5
Review Title: Thịt nướng hàn quốc meat & meet
Review Text:
- Thịt nướng Hàn Quốc chổ này khá ổn, nhân viên cũng nhiệt tình nhưng có thể do lúc mình tới dùng bữa nhà hàng hơi đông nên khi thay vĩ nướng phải đợi 1 tí. Nhưng xét về đồ ăn thì có thể đánh giá từ 7 điểm trở lên.
Nếu đi 2 người thì nên chọn gói 279k gói này mình thích vì có canh kimchi (ngày trước nghe nói là lẩu nhưng bây giờ đã đổi lại thành canh). Tiếc cái là không được refill, phải ăn hết thì mới được refill. Thế cũng tốt vì tránh lãng phí thức ăn.
Mình thích món bulogi vì mềm và ngon, ăn kèm với cơm trộn thì tuyệt vời.
Tổng quan mình cho 7 điểm nhé có thể lúc mình đi trời hơi nóng nên trong đó không được mát lắm.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Meat and meet korean BBQ, hochiminh city
Review Text:
Meat and meet korean BBQ , located at takashimaya mall, ground floor, hochiminh city, vietnam.
The location very strategic, city centre of hochiminh city ...
This is buffet (all u can eat) korean bbq restaurant.
I've visited this resto several times while in hochiminh city, good taste as usual korean bbq, good services as well ...
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Text: We accidentally found this restaurant just walking around the city. You need to take an elevator up to enter. It’s definitely a spot for locals to go and have fun. We ordered the basic meal ($9.50 per person) and when we were done, the waiter asked us if we wanted more because it was all you could eat! We were full and had to catch a plane so we declined. It was a healthy meal at a great price in a great city. I would recommend it to anyone.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Book if possible save the wait
Review Text:
Would definitely recommend to book can get extremely busy
Will turned up on spec around 630 pm left number to call when ready
Took about 40 minutes to be seated but we'll worth the wait
It's an experience as well as lovely food
Before you go in read the instructions on what to do not complicated tho
We booked for the following night was that good
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Text:
Mình đã đến Meet & Meat Crescent Nall Q7, HCM ngày 11/12/2022 ăn trưa cùng gia đình và đã có 1 trải nghiệm thật tồi tệ. 
Nhân viên phục vụ rất chậm, không thay vĩ nướng cho đến khi mình gọi ý ới nhiều lần. 
Thức ăn thì lên rất chậm. 
Quan trọng nhất mình không đồng ý là cũng cùng chuỗi Meet & Meat nhưng o đây phải trả thêm tiền nước uống, không có máy nước ngọt bao gồm trong giá buffet như ở Vincom store. Và kem thì mỗi người 1 hộp kem rất nhớ của Merino gì đấy. 
Hôm nay mình lại nhận được tin nhắn của 1 bạn tên Ngoc nói là bên M&M quên tính tiền một số món nước và mình đã Ck cho cô này. Nhưng mình thấy bên store này tất tần tật đều tất trách & không chuyên nghiệp. 
Nói Chung là chỉ có thể nói là TỆ toàn tập 100% . 

Mình mong là ban giám đốc thương hiệu này đọc được comment này mà chỉnh đốn lại Nhân sự của store này “Meet & Meat Crescent Mall, Quận 7, Tp. Hcm).
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 4
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 4
Review Text: je pense que la formule est très intéressante, on choisit sur un buffet légumes et viandes de qualité et on fait cuire comme nous le souhaitons. Les grilles de cuisson sont changées régulièrement, et le buffet est à volonté. Le service est exemplaire et le personnel très compétent et affable. Vous terminé le repas avec de la crème glacée qui est excellente. Le service est très rapide et l'on vous présente les différentes formules à l'arrivée. Il n'y  a pas besoin de réserver. Environ 10€ par repas le midi boisson a volonté incluse
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Not seated. No real reason given.
Review Text: We were denied service. Arrived at 17:38 and we were told we could not be seated because they were holding tables until 19:30, almost two hours away. Then they tried to tell us that they would not seat 2 people and they only had room for a group of ten. The truth is they had plenty of space (see picture) and could not provide any real reason for not serving us. Disgraceful!
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Text: Waiter burned this lady with a grill and manager blamed victim and not only made her pay her bill also blamed the victim
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: A waiter dropped the hot grill  with boiling oil onto my shoulder, causing a long scar.
Review Text:
On September 20th, a waiter was holding the used grill in one hand while trying to place the new one on to the table, thus, slipping the hot grill onto my shoulder, causing a painful long line of burn. The incident wouldn’t have been worth mentioning if the restaurant would have fulfill its responsibilities and promises.  At the time, the restaurant manager named Hoa brought me ointment for the wound and told me to rest assured, the restaurant would take responsibility for this. When I expressed concern about the scarring of the burn, she said to let the wound heal and the company will pay for the treating of the scar. Now that I contacted the manager again, she tried to shift the blame onto me for “talking to my friends while the waiter was changing the grill”. After a very long conversation, she said that she had passed my case to her upper management and I will be contacted by her boss soon. Of course, no one has contacted me since. 

What annoys me the most besides the pain of burns and scarring on my body is the feeling of being deceived.  Meat & Meet BBQ Restaurant and manager Hoa handled the incident by promising customers things only to deny them later on.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Text: Very poor, bad communication. Come with 2 or 4. More is a problem you keep getting pushed back. Have been before with 4 and great food and book is a must. I think we are getting in soon. Looking forward to it even after the long wait
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Text: . . . có khả năng. Họ yêu cầu tôi phải trả tiền cho hai người. . . anoying. Tôi phủ nhận và nhảy vọt. Ít nhất họ không cho tôi vào và thông báo cho tôi trước.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Text:
A fantastic concept and delicious food
Korean BBQ place housed out of container ships
All you can eat, so you can order whichever meets you like best as much as you want
199.000/head Banquet was plenty
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Ăn tối với bé ob xmas
Review Text:
Nơi tuyệt vời, và phổ biến với người dân địa phương. Đặt bàn có thể hữu ích, cần đợi vài phút. Cô gái phục hồi sẽ tắt chúng tôi, nhưng người quản lý / người phục vụ nói với ua 5 phút để chúng tôi chờ đợi và giả vờ giả khi cô gái đang nói. . .
Giá rất tốt / quolity và chúng tôi đã quản lý để làm điều đó! Chúng tôi đã nhìn xung quanh đầu tiên và chỉ copyd người dân địa phương. Thực phẩm tốt với nơi tốt đẹp và hợp thời trang. Bữa tối cho hai người là 640 đồng
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Text:
Queríamos comer algo de carne en Vietnam y este restaurante nos pareció de los mejores que probamos, escoges un tipo de “calidad” y puedes comer toda la carne que quieras de esa calidad a precio cerrado tipo buffet. 

El servicio es muy atento y amable, el local también es chulo, muy recomendable. 

Comparado con Europa o Japón, es un 60% más barato.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Bữa tối đầu tiên tại TP HCM (tháng 11 năm 2019)
Review Text: Lần đầu tiên đến thăm nơi mà bạn tôi giới thiệu nơi này cho bữa tối. Thực phẩm là thực sự tốt và nạp đầy thịt không giới hạn (phụ thuộc vào thực đơn) và giá cả hợp lý.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container

Review Title: Hele ervaring, op z’n Koreaans BBQ’en
Review Text: Onze eerste keer Koreaanse BBQ was gelijk een topper bij Meat & Meet. Te gek om op deze manier zelf te BBQ’en! Het vlees en de bijgerechten smaakten stuk voor stuk goed, het personeel reguleerde de hitte voor ons en ondanks het all you can eat karakter had het gelukkig geen ‘vreetschuur-gehalte’. Enige aandachtspunt is dat het heel rumoerig is binnen, maar dat draagt misschien ook juist weer bij aan de ervaring. Must try, als je dit net als wij nog nooit gedaan hebt. Kosten waren €24 met twee personen en vier drankjes.
Location: Nhà Hàng Hàn Quốc Meat & Meet BBQ Container
